# Fun Facts
 - I was born with a bicuspid aortic valve and consequently have a gnarly [cardiac thrill](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Heart_murmur)
 - I hold the [Mississippi state record](http://staterunningrecords.com/asp/records.asp?action=processsearch&state=MS&distance=50%20Km&sex=MALE) for the fastest 50k time for 24-year-old males (extraordinarily specific)
 - I have a scar on my head because I was --- literally --- impaled by a spear when I was 12 years old
 - The first concert I ever attended was B.B. King!
